Entities.Name: Abbreviation

Entities.Name: Uncertainty
Entities.Definition: Hedge cues indicating uncertainty or probability.

Dataset.Name: SpRadIE 2021 Dataset
Dataset.Description: Annotated ultrasonography reports from a pediatric hospital in Argentina. Reports are in Spanish, contain noise (typos/grammar issues), and were annotated for NER by clinical experts and revised by linguists.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Each report is annotated using BIO tagging across 10 entity types. Ambiguities include multi-label tokens (e.g., 'cm' as Measure and Abbreviation). Annotators used expert-provided schemas and entity spans were aligned to domain-specific cues (e.g., hedge terms, medical measurements, findings).
